channel.title: [Crash] Forget about freeman(?) bm_c2a5g, spamming some air strikes
channel.description: This is either the very end of surface tension or the very beginning of forget about freeman, I don't know which, but I still haven't played the game through yet Spammed air strikes, killed the gargantuan, and I guess I spammed one too many strikes - got a crash. I got a weird error box too but was too fast and clicked it away. 10 minutes of trying to reproduce this and I could not, sorry! I think it might be a physics derp of some sort relating to a gib flying? :retard: The mdmp should be attached. If it's not [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1585&stc=1&d=1347738965[/url] hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T19_36_41C0.mdmp (111 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Forget about freeman(?) bm_c2a5g, spamming some air strikes
item.dc:creator: Cprossu
item.description:
This is either the very end of surface tension or the very beginning of forget about freeman, I don’t know which, but I still haven’t played the game through yet

Spammed air strikes, killed the gargantuan, and I guess I spammed one too many strikes - got a crash. I got a weird error box too but was too fast and clicked it away. 10 minutes of trying to reproduce this and I could not, sorry!

I think it might be a physics derp of some sort relating to a gib flying? :retard:

The mdmp should be attached.

If it’s not
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1585&stc=1&d=1347738965
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T19_36_41C0.mdmp (111 KB)

Read full topic
